EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Referral (1351717309.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Referral (1351717309.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jack, You are very welcome! I actually spoke with Paul and had a great conversation with him, so thank you for the referral! I appreciate the great, positive feedback and hope to get the chance to work with you in the future! Thank you for following up and I wish you luck with the job hunt. Have a great evening,Nicolette From: Jack Gavalas [mailto:jack5352@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2012 5:08 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Referral Hi, Nicolette; thanks for checking in, ma'am! Right now I'm getting in the job hunt groove, so probably not looking into MBO in the near future. I have, however, referred a protege of mine to you, and he found the initial discussions with your folks very inviting. Paul Jackman is his name, and he's exactly the kind of young entrepreneur that would probably soar like a meteor with MBO support. Perhaps in the future, if I find a partner with some connections that could get us going in business right away that I just don't have, MBO would be my first choice, and I'd be very likely to recommend y'all to them as well -- your product practically sells itself. Until then, best regards, Jack From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> To: "jack5352@yahoo.com <mailto:jack5352@yahoo.com>" <jack5352@yahoo.com <mailto:jack5352@yahoo.com>> Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2012 9:28 AM Subject: MBO Partners Referral Hi Jack, I just wanted to follow up with you again as it has been about a month since I last reached out. If you are interested in hearing more about MBO Partners, please schedule a call on my calendar by clicking here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I hope all is well and I look forward to speaking with you! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
